body:
<!-- Please only use this template for submitting reports about failing tests in Kubernetes CI jobs -->

**Which jobs are failing / job(s) where test is present**:
* ci-kubernetes-e2e-gce-new-master-upgrade-master-parallel
* ci-kubernetes-e2e-gce-new-master-gci-kubectl-skew

**Which test(s) are failing**:
[sig-cli] Kubectl client [k8s.io] Simple pod should handle in-cluster config

**Since when has it been failing**:
It has been failing since 8/13.

**Testgrid link**:
* https://testgrid.k8s.io/sig-release-orphaned#gce-new-master-upgrade-master-parallel
* https://testgrid.k8s.io/sig-cli-master#skew-cluster-stable1-kubectl-latest-gce

**Reason for failure**:
```
/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/kubectl/kubectl.go:621
Expected
    <exec.CodeExitError>: {
        Err: {
            s: "error running &{../../../../kubernetes_skew/cluster/kubectl.sh [../../../../kubernetes_skew/cluster/kubectl.sh --server=https://34.83.124.226 --kubeconfig=/workspace/.kube/config exec --namespace=kubectl-5797 nginx -- /bin/sh -x -c /tmp/kubectl get pods --token=invalid --v=7 2>&1] []  <nil> I0821 19:51:49.587176     102 merged_client_builder.go:164] Using in-cluster namespace
I0821 19:51:49.587839     102 merged_client_builder.go:122] Using in-cluster configuration
I0821 19:51:49.594295     102 merged_client_builder.go:122] Using in-cluster configuration
I0821 19:51:49.602903     102 merged_client_builder.go:122] Using in-cluster configuration
I0821 19:51:49.603669     102 round_trippers.go:420] GET https://10.0.0.1:443/api/v1/namespaces/kubectl-5797/pods?limit=500
I0821 19:51:49.603894     102 round_trippers.go:427] Request Headers:
I0821 19:51:49.604071     102 round_trippers.go:431]     Accept: application/json;as=Table;v=v1beta1;g=meta.k8s.io, application/json
I0821 19:51:49.604204     102 round_trippers.go:431]     User-Agent: kubectl/v1.17.0 (linux/amd64) kubernetes/90df64b
I0821 19:51:49.604360     102 round_trippers.go:431]     Authorization: Bearer <masked>
I0821 19:51:49.628462     102 round_trippers.go:446] Response Status: 401 Unauthorized in 23 milliseconds
I0821 19:51:49.629333     102 helpers.go:199] server response object: [{
  "kind": "Status",
  "apiVersion": "v1",
  "metadata": {},
  "status": "Failure",
  "message": "Unauthorized",
  "reason": "Unauthorized",
  "code": 401
}]
F0821 19:51:49.629526     102 helpers.go:114] error: You must be logged in to the server (Unauthorized)
 + /tmp/kubectl get pods '--token=invalid' '--v=7'
command terminated with exit code 255
 [] <nil> 0xc0048fcf90 exit status 255 <nil> <nil> true [0xc00592a1e8 0xc00592a200 0xc00592a218] [0xc00592a1e8 0xc00592a200 0xc00592a218] [0xc00592a1f8 0xc00592a210] [0x9d21f0 0x9d21f0] 0xc001ba2360 <nil>}:
Command stdout:
I0821 19:51:49.587176     102 merged_client_builder.go:164] Using in-cluster namespace
I0821 19:51:49.587839     102 merged_client_builder.go:122] Using in-cluster configuration
I0821 19:51:49.594295     102 merged_client_builder.go:122] Using in-cluster configuration
I0821 19:51:49.602903     102 merged_client_builder.go:122] Using in-cluster configuration
I0821 19:51:49.603669     102 round_trippers.go:420] GET https://10.0.0.1:443/api/v1/namespaces/kubectl-5797/pods?limit=500
I0821 19:51:49.603894     102 round_trippers.go:427] Request Headers:
I0821 19:51:49.604071     102 round_trippers.go:431]     Accept: application/json;as=Table;v=v1beta1;g=meta.k8s.io, application/json
I0821 19:51:49.604204     102 round_trippers.go:431]     User-Agent: kubectl/v1.17.0 (linux/amd64) kubernetes/90df64b
I0821 19:51:49.604360     102 round_trippers.go:431]     Authorization: Bearer <masked>
I0821 19:51:49.628462     102 round_trippers.go:446] Response Status: 401 Unauthorized in 23 milliseconds
I0821 19:51:49.629333     102 helpers.go:199] server response object: [{
  "kind": "Status",
  "apiVersion": "v1",
  "metadata": {},
  "status": "Failure",
  "message": "Unauthorized",
  "reason": "Unauthorized",
  "code": 401
}]
F0821 19:51:49.629526     102 helpers.go:114] error: You must be logged in to the server (Unauthorized)

stderr:
+ /tmp/kubectl get pods '--token=invalid' '--v=7'
command terminated with exit code 255

error:
exit status 255",
        },
        Code: 255,
    }
to contain substring
    <string>: Authorization: Bearer invalid
/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/kubectl/kubectl.go:721
```

I think the failure is coming from this part of the test https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/test/e2e/kubectl/kubectl.go#L720

/milestone v1.16
/priority critical-urgent
/kind failing-test
/sig sig-cli
/cc @kubernetes/sig-cli-test-failures 
/cc @Verolop @jimangel @soggiest @alenkacz

title: [Failing Test] [sig-cli] Kubectl client [k8s.io] Simple pod should handle in-cluster config
